entry.title: $1995 // Charming 1 Bed w/ LAUNDRY in PRIME Crown Heights
entry.content:
Charming 1 Bedroom w/ LAUNDRY in PRIME Crown Heights

* Short Walk to Brooklyn Botanic Garden & Prospect Park *

** Around the Corner to 2/3/4/5 Trains **

Contact Paulo today! 619-850-5547 - paulo@zjamarealty.com

APARTMENT FEATURES:
- SPACIOUS Bedroom
- Stainless Steel Appliances
- BRAND NEW Fully Tiled Bathroom
- Hardwood Floors Throughout
- Great Closet Space
- LOTS of Sunlight

This 1 Bedrooms is Conveniently Located Just Steps to All the Best Cafes, Bars, Restaurants, Health Food Stores, Trendy Shops and SO Much More Crown Heights has to offer!!!

All applicants must have 700+ credit score and make 40x the rent. Guarantors accepted.

Contact Paulo today to schedule an exclusive viewing before it's gone.

Paulo
619-850-5547
paulo@zjamarealty.com
www.zjamarealty.com

entry.title: $2195 // Amazing 1Bed apt next to 2,3,4,5,S Trains *Prospect Park* H/H Included
entry.content:
Amazing newly renovated one bedroom unit right off Franklin Ave in the heart of Crown Heights.

Heat and Hot water Included!
Hardwood floors and a brand new kitchen with dish washer and bathroom.
On a quiet, tree-lined street, just off one of the most popular retail strips in Brooklyn, Franklin Avenue!
Convenient train access just steps away 2,3,4,5,S lines, and a short walk to Prospect Park, the Brooklyn Museum, the Botanic Gardens, and More!

NO Broker's fee!

Call / Email / Text before its gone!
